cancelIntro.title: Do you want to terminate your insurance:
cancelIntro.footer: Your insurance will be terminated by {{date}}. Insurance premiums are charged per every month started.
cancelIntro.primaryButton: I understand and wish to terminate

cancelVictory.title: The insurance has been terminated
cancelVictory.detail: Your request to terminate insurance has been accepted for processing. Your insurance will be canceled by {{date}}. Thank you for using our services. You can always renew your insurance in Smart Banka.

cancelForOfferVictory.title: We have received the cancellation request
cancelForOfferVictory.detail: We have received the request to cancel the insurance. The insurance shall be canceled by {{date}}. You can now arrange new insurance.

cancelDisagree.title: We canâ€™t continue without your permission.
cancelDisagree.detail: Should you have any questions regarding your contract, do not hesitate to contact us. We are happy to help.
